tests.name: should receive video loadeddata event for
suites: testing hls.js playback in the browser on ""
tests.code: it(`should receive video loadeddata event for ${stream.description}`, testLoadedData.bind(null, url, config));

tests.name: seek back to start and play for
suites: testing hls.js playback in the browser on ""
tests.code: it(`seek back to start and play for ${stream.description}`, testSeekBackToStart.bind(null, url, config));

tests.name: should "smooth switch" to highest level and still play after 2s for
suites: testing hls.js playback in the browser on ""
tests.code: it(`should "smooth switch" to highest level and still play after 2s for ${stream.description}`, testSmoothSwitch.bind(null, url, config));

tests.name: should seek near the end and receive video seeked event for
suites: testing hls.js playback in the browser on ""
tests.code: it(`should seek near the end and receive video seeked event for ${stream.description}`, testSeekOnLive.bind(null, url, config));

tests.name: should buffer up to maxBufferLength or video.duration for
suites: testing hls.js playback in the browser on ""
tests.code: it(`should buffer up to maxBufferLength or video.duration for ${stream.description}`, testIdleBufferLength.bind(null, url, config));

tests.name: should play
suites: testing hls.js playback in the browser on ""
tests.code: it(`should play ${stream.description}`, testIsPlayingVOD.bind(null, url, config));

tests.name: should seek 3s from end and receive video ended event for  with 2 or less buffered ranges
suites: testing hls.js playback in the browser on ""
tests.code: it(`should seek 3s from end and receive video ended event for ${stream.description} with 2 or less buffered ranges`, testSeekOnVOD.bind(null, url, config));
